name: AccessibilityCustomContentKey
desc: Key used to specify the identifier and label associated with an entry of additional accessibility information.

items.name: init(LocalizedStringKey)
items.desc: Create an AccessibilityCustomContentKey with the specified label.

items.name: init(Text, id: String)
items.desc: Create an AccessibilityCustomContentKey with the specified label and identifier.

items.name: init(LocalizedStringKey, id: String)
items.desc: Create an AccessibilityCustomContentKey with the specified label and identifier.
